宜家果條act 相比
US-HK act 威力值相距 1/10000.

New act only aims on HK officials.
HK act aims on everything.

簡單講 ，按《美港關係法》
- 禁止HKD同USD自由兑換
- 禁止中國香港政府所有美元資產包括債券國庫券在國際流通
- 凍結中國香港政府所有以美元計價及在美國本土的所有資產（包括以美元計價的外匯儲備）



Per to US-HK act, please cancel all the following terms,

(4) The United States should continue to grant the products of Hong Kong nondiscriminatory trade treatment by virtue of Hong Kong's membership in the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade.

(5) The United States should recognize certificates of origin for manufactured goods issued by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

(6) The United States should continue to allow the United States dollar to be freely exchanged with the Hong Kong dollar.



(8) The United States should continue to support access by Hong Kong to sensitive technologies controlled under the agreement of the Coordinating Committee for Multilateral Export Controls (commonly referred to as "COCOM") for so long as the United States is satisfied that such technologies are protected from improper use or export.

All these terms should be suspended immediately.

Termination of suspension

An Executive order issued under subsection (a) may be terminated by the President with respect to a particular law or provision of law whenever the President determines that Hong Kong has regained sufficient autonomy to justify different treatment under the law or provision of law in question. Notice of any such termination shall be published in the Federal Register.

(Pub. L. 102–383, title II, §202, Oct. 5, 1992, 106 Stat. 1453.)


Presidential determination

On or after July 1, 1997, whenever the President determines that Hong Kong is not sufficiently autonomous to justify treatment under a particular law of the United States, or any provision thereof, different from that accorded the People's Republic of China, the President may issue an Executive order suspending the application of section 5721(a) of this title to such law or provision of law.

(b) Factor for consideration

In making a determination under subsection (a) with respect to the application of a law of the United States, or any provision thereof, to Hong Kong, the President should consider the terms, obligations, and expectations expressed in the Joint Declaration with respect to Hong Kong.




References:

https://uscode.house.gov/view.xhtml?path=/prelim@title22/chapter66&edition=prelim

宜家果條act 相比
US-HK act 威力值相距 1/10000.

New act only aims on HK officials.
HK act aims on everything.

簡單講 ，按《美港關係法》
- 禁止HKD同USD自由兑換
- 禁止中國香港政府所有美元資產包括債券國庫券在國際流通
- 凍結中國香港政府所有以美元計價及在美國本土的所有資產（包括以美元計價的外匯儲備）



Per to US-HK act, please cancel all the following terms,

(4) The United States should continue to grant the products of Hong Kong nondiscriminatory trade treatment by virtue of Hong Kong's membership in the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade.

(5) The United States should recognize certificates of origin for manufactured goods issued by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

(6) The United States should continue to allow the United States dollar to be freely exchanged with the Hong Kong dollar.



(8) The United States should continue to support access by Hong Kong to sensitive technologies controlled under the agreement of the Coordinating Committee for Multilateral Export Controls (commonly referred to as "COCOM") for so long as the United States is satisfied that such technologies are protected from improper use or export.

All these terms should be suspended immediately.

Termination of suspension

An Executive order issued under subsection (a) may be terminated by the President with respect to a particular law or provision of law whenever the President determines that Hong Kong has regained sufficient autonomy to justify different treatment under the law or provision of law in question. Notice of any such termination shall be published in the Federal Register.

(Pub. L. 102–383, title II, §202, Oct. 5, 1992, 106 Stat. 1453.)


Presidential determination

On or after July 1, 1997, whenever the President determines that Hong Kong is not sufficiently autonomous to justify treatment under a particular law of the United States, or any provision thereof, different from that accorded the People's Republic of China, the President may issue an Executive order suspending the application of section 5721(a) of this title to such law or provision of law.

(b) Factor for consideration

In making a determination under subsection (a) with respect to the application of a law of the United States, or any provision thereof, to Hong Kong, the President should consider the terms, obligations, and expectations expressed in the Joint Declaration with respect to Hong Kong.




References:

https://uscode.house.gov/view.xhtml?path=/prelim@title22/chapter66&edition=prelim

而且中國正積極發展社會監控技術。在人類對科技應用的倫理尚未有結論的同時，中國不斷研發和開拓科技在獨裁統治方面的應用。全面的監控以及評分制度，基本上令任何異見、反抗都不再可能存在。這種行為的威脅是全球性的，因為有關技術隨時可以出售予任何國家，從根本層面上威脅民主制度既存在，自由世界沒有人可以獨善其身。

Sorry I was at work. Thank you all for all the input you provided.

關於Video：

私下參考用唔需要版權。越暴力越好。

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

關於請求支持：

請佢留意星期日香港人表達對美國幫助嘅感謝：This is very useful for us. 美國人好鍾意睇外國人支持美國。8號一定要出街。

所以唔好支持任何一邊,介入人地內政,美國係咁,英國都係,兩邊都要approach,但係唔好評論人地野：Agree. Most Americans from both left and right support our fight for democracy and freedom. The only disagreement is how much America should do to help.

提佢畫面令人不安，曾加震撼力：Yes. That's why I am asking for videos.

叫中國遵守返中英聯合聲明：Agree. The joint declaration is a binding legal document justify all sanctions against CCP.

科技嘅監控入侵：Yes. The high tech dystopia in China is frightening for all freedom loving people. We should do everything to stop CCP to normalize this practice. Actually US is facing the same problem as NSA/FBI/CIA expanding their surveillance on citizens. This would be a wining issue for Democrats if they can address the issue.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

關於加辣：

Sorry my comments may be depressing. But I am just trying to think about something practical that may actually become law.

個人認為可請求佢過左條法例先 再說服加辣：Actually I am thinking about the same thing. The current version is in the House. The senate version can be a little bit different. But if we introduce something too controversial it may delay the whole act.

凍結官員親屬財產：This is actually controversial. Americans believe in individualism. Not everyone approves punishing criminals' family members. Especially when their family members are US citizens, they have all the constitutional rights and it may hinder the whole act. See https://www.nytimes.com/2018/11/25/us/politics/china-exit-ban.html 一個支共貪官嘅美國公民子女俾禁止離開中國。都係controversial news.

禁止黑警及其家屬入境美國：I will recommend adding all 速龍 members into the bill. It may be too much adding all police members into the list. See https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-47857140 It was controversial when Trump designate a branch of Iran national force as a terrorist group. Limiting the list to all 速龍 members is more practical.

給予政治庇護/公民身份：I will recommend waive detention for HK protestors if they seek asylum without valid visa. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amos_Yee 一個新加坡嘅異議少年比美國 ICE 關咗9個月。如果waive detention攞庇護會簡單好多。Besides that, I will recommend remove "non-violent" from the bill. It may be used against the 勇武派。

取消美港關係法：This is the nuclear option. It may send global economy into chaos. See: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/jim-cramer-hong-kong-protests-130045124.html I suspect it is the reason Trump changed his stance from calling the protest a "riot" to warning China against using force. I will tell the Senator your determination for 攬炒 but I will also inform them about the consequences.

清朝債券：呢個口頭屌下幾好。但司法上有statute of limitation，sovereign immunity同埋non bis in idem三重難關。I don't think this would lead to anything meaningful.

叫美國踢走同取消晒佢地美國籍：你哋覺得我係鬼，香港而家都係支那白手套，佢哋仲覺得你哋係鬼。鬼佬排外唔係香港人咁用嘴，佢哋廣東人當日本人打死都冇事：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_of_Vincent_Chin 你哋喺香港唔明白，我啲就真係唔敢去 normalize racism。

Besides everything you mentioned. I am also thinking banning US companies to export tear gas and other weapons to HK police.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Things I really don't want to answer:

大陸仔／殘體字：Sorry 最近用好多殘體字。我係美國廣東人。家族喺大陸、香港、新加坡都有親戚。其實我同大陸嘅親戚都用埋正體字，佢哋都反共。但係而家喺美國有幾個大陸移民嘅business partners。我同佢哋都用殘體字，驚俾佢哋屌。你覺得我係鬼都好，I am just trying to help. 除咗我之外，而家美國有好多巴打絲打都做緊嘢，多數都係 blue state residents. 你哋就當做幫佢哋出謀劃策, OK?

Proof? New account?: 今朝 sent 咗。

點解議員會見你？：US senators and congresspeople have the responsibility to listen to their constituents. Senator 需要向全州選民負責。佢哋都有staff收集民情。有時重要啲會比meeting opportunity. 而家美國選民唔係好關心香港，唔係好多聲音。所以我哋嘅聲音可能都影響到一票。(參議院一共100票）

replies.msg:
Just to share the comments from my friend in US

======

1) From what he replied and the comments at the bottom, he must be active Democrats. Even though he claimed that Senators have the responsibility to see the constituents, it doesn’t mean they really see you. What they normally do is to delay the request and ask the assistant to accommodate you

2) I agree that we should approach both sides. This will have ripple effect. In fact, there is a majority of people aren’t associated with either of the party. What you need to stress is to spread the equality, freedom and democracy. That is the fundamental value in US. We are very concerned about our rights. For instance, there is a poster in the office pantry to list all worker rights and secret hotline.

3) If you want Americans to help, you need to make justification. What benefits can Americans get? What is the value of Hong Kong? I lean towards to say that China manipulate Hong Kong to take advantage of US. Then, you need to think of the solution to fix the problem.
